learning_objective: Create procedures with parameters to organize code and make it easier to reuse.
topic: Managing Special Dietary Needs and Allergies
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is creating a mobile app to help manage their family's special dietary needs and allergies. They want to list all family members with their allergens and dietary restrictions. Also when adding a new menu, they should check for violations with family member’s dietary needs. Alex has already written the code to gather family member’s information, and a unique identifier (id) was assigned to each family member. Now, to simplify the application, they is considering writing a procedure to reuse the code for validation. What should the parameter(s) be for the procedure?",
    "Answer1": "The id of each family member",
    "Answer2": "The name and allergens of the family member",
    "Answer3": "The entire dataset for the family",
    "Answer4": "The allergens and dietary restrictions of the family member",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "Alex should write a procedure that takes a family member's unique identifier (id) as a parameter. This parameter will allow the procedure to extract the relevant data from the family's data set and perform necessary validation, simplifying the rest of the code."
}
